SELECT p.prescription_id AS prescriptionId, pa.name AS patientName, pa.gender, pa.patient_no AS patientNo, p.drug_id, d.drug_name AS drugName, c.category_name AS drugCategory, p.dosage, p.quantity, p.prescribe_time, p.remark FROM prescription p JOIN registration r ON p.registration_id = r.registration_id JOIN patient pa ON r.patient_id = pa.patient_id JOIN drug d ON p.drug_id = d.drug_id JOIN drug_category c ON d.category_id = c.category_id WHERE p.status = 'UNFINISHED'
AND ( pa.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR d.drug_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') )
ORDER BY CONVERT(pa.name USING gbk)
ORDER BY p.prescribe_time
ASC
DESC
LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM prescription p JOIN registration r ON p.registration_id = r.registration_id JOIN patient pa ON r.patient_id = pa.patient_id JOIN drug d ON p.drug_id = d.drug_id JOIN drug_category c ON d.category_id = c.category_id WHERE p.status = 'UNFINISHED'
AND ( pa.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR d.drug_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') )
SELECT registration_id FROM prescription WHERE prescription_id = #{prescriptionId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM prescription WHERE registration_id = #{registrationId} AND status != 'FINISHED'
SELECT status FROM prescription WHERE prescription_id = #{prescriptionId}

SELECT p.prescription_id, pat.patient_no, pat.name AS patient_name, p.drug_id, d.drug_name, p.quantity, (p.quantity * d.retail_price) AS amount FROM prescription p LEFT JOIN registration r ON p.registration_id = r.registration_id LEFT JOIN patient pat ON r.patient_id = pat.patient_id LEFT JOIN drug d ON p.drug_id = d.drug_id WHERE p.prescription_id = #{prescriptionId}

SELECT record_id, prescription_id, patient_no, patient_name, drug_id, drug_name, quantity, amount, operate_type, operator_id, operate_time, remark FROM pharmacy_record
AND (patient_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR drug_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
AND operate_type = #{type}
ORDER BY CONVERT(patient_name USING gbk)
ORDER BY amount
ORDER BY operate_time
ASC
DESC
LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
